sentences.en: Reinvigorate at the health club or with a few laps in the inviting indoor pool.
sentences.cn: 或在健身俱乐部恢复活力,在氛围宜人的室内泳池纵情畅游.

sentences.en: The first is to reinvigorate their economies.
The good news for committed shoppers is a so-called 'soft break' – a few minutes rest grabbing a coffee, for example - can reinvigorate our senses, although only temporarily.
sentences.cn: 对于那些热衷购物的人来说，好消息是，稍事休息一下——比如花几分钟喝杯咖啡——可以使我们的感官重新振作，虽然这仅是暂时的。

sentences.en: They reinvigorate me for the next nasty surprise and offer assurance that I can thrive.
sentences.cn: 它们给我新的活力以应对突如其来的险境,并确保我再度辉煌.

sentences.en: This not only alleviates boredom, it can reinvigorate you.
sentences.cn: 这不但能舒缓烦闷, 还能使你恢复活力.

sentences.en: We need to reinvigorate the economy of the area.
sentences.cn: 我们需要给这个地区的经济注入新的活力。

trans.tran_en: to put vitality and vigour back into (someone or something)
